mapper.insert: insert into MEAL (user_id, title, body, total, img, date, reg_date, mod_date) VALUES (#{user_id}, #{title}, #{body}, #{total}, #{img}, #{date}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE MEAL SET status = 1 WHERE date > CURDATE()
mapper.select: select count(*) from MEAL where status = 1
select * from MEAL order by reg_date desc LIMIT #{skip}, #{amount}
